The user requested the addition of a button labeled "Shoryouken" in their application. The AI acknowledged this request and is currently working on it. To further refine the implementation, the AI presented two sets of questions. The first set asked where the "Shoryouken" button should be placed—options included on the main trading screen for easy access or in the settings menu as a special feature. The second set focused on the button's function, presenting the choices of initiating a new trade with a randomized pairing system or opening a secret page with special deals. Additionally, the user was offered a checklist of features to consider implementing alongside the button, which included adding detailed tooltips, a confirmation dialog, button customization, animation for engagement, a user feedback form, and a shortcut key guide; some of which have been marked as complete, such as customizing and animating the button. Overall, the conversation revolved around enhancing user engagement through the "Shoryouken" button and related features.
